class.name: BatchLauncher

constructor.name: BatchLauncher
constructor.doc: Default constructor.

method.name: setProcessname
method.doc:
Setter for the Ant processName attribute.
@param processName The single batch process to be run.

method.name: setParameters
setUsername
main
method.doc:
Main method entry point for the Batch Launcher. @param arguments If no arguments are provided the database is queried for any queued batch programs. Alternatively a single batch program can be invoked by passing parameters in the following format:
  • Parameter 1 - fully.qualified.class.name.operation
  • Parameter 2 - (Optional) parameters for the batch process i.e. structField1=param1, structField2=param2, structField3=param3
  • Parameter 3 - (Optional) A valid application user name for authentication. @throws ExitException if any errors are caught during the batch processing

field.name: kDBtoJMSoncePerBatchSession
field.doc:
Constant for batch launcher notification mode: The batch launcher triggers any database-to-JMS processing at the end of the batch session.
@see curam.util.resources.EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher#kDBtoJMSnotificationMode EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher#kDBtoJMSnotificationMode

field.name: kDBtoJMSoncePerBatchProgram
field.doc:
Constant for batch launcher notification mode: The batch launcher triggers any database-to-JMS processing at the end of each batch program.
@see curam.util.resources.EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher#kDBtoJMSnotificationMode EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher#kDBtoJMSnotificationMode

field.name: kBatchLauncherCategory
field.doc: This constant is used to name the category into which the batch launcher related trace output is placed.

field.name: kBatchLauncherLogger
field.doc: This constant is an alias which allows batch launcher related tracing information to be written.

class.doc:
The BatchLauncher is a utility to launch batch programs.

It can launch batch programs in one of two ways:

  • Launching a specific Batch Program and using the parameters passed in;
    • Parameter 1 - fully.qualified.class.name.operation
    • Parameter 2 - (Optional) parameters for the batch process i.e. structField1=param1, structField2=param2, structField3=param3
    • Parameter 3 - A valid application user name for authentication

  • Run all processes identified in the BatchProcRequest table. This processes all the batch program requests stored in the BatchProcRequest table in order of their TimeRequested value - i.e. first-come-first-served. Requests are deleted from the table immediately before the job is executed, so if the job fails it must be manually resubmitted to the queue.
Emails are sent to the submitter of the job containing information about the completion status of the job.

The return code in relation to the BatchLauncher can be configured by adding an entry to the `BatchErrorCodes` database table. The message id entry (e.g. {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_RUNTIME RUN_ID_RUNTIME}) in the database table should match the MessageFile entry of the expected exception. The description field, which must be a number, will then be thrown as the return code. @author BD

class.name: DeferredProcessing

method.name: startProcess
method.doc:
Used to invoke application-defined deferred process methods. Calls to this method return without waiting for the invoked process to complete (hence 'deferred' processing). However, the invocation of the deferred method is dependent on a successful commit of the the caller's transaction context. If the calling method's transaction rolls back, the deferred process will not be invoked (this safeguards application consistency).

Note: if this method is called outside of an Application Server, then the deferred process method call will be stored in a collection of deferred process method calls associated with the current transaction. At the end of the business interface method call, all of deferred process method calls made as part of the business interface call will be invoked synchronously (this is to allow unit testing of deferred processes).

Uses the global error handler set in the property {@link curam.util.resources.EnvironmentConstants.Custom#kCallbackClassPropertyName curam.custom.deferredprocessing.dpcallback}. @param processName The name of the deferred process to be invoked. This is not the name of a class method, it is the process name as defined in the Curam Workflow Management System Developers Guide. @param instDataID The ID of a record on the WMInstanceData table. WMInstanceData is an application-defined table that is populated with information required by the deferred process. @throws AppRuntimeException if a null or empty string is passed as a process name, or if the methods to start a deferred process or handle deferred process invocation errors cannot be found on the associated object. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED} - if a connection or session could not be created. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION} - if there is no connection to the named queue. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED} - if the JMS service reported any errors while trying to send the message. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#ID_ERR_DP_ENACTMENT ID_ERR_DP_ENACTMENT} - if any un-handled exceptions occur while enacting the deferred process. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_INVALID_PARAMETER_EXCEPTION RUN_ID_INVALID_PARAMETER_EXCEPTION} - if the processName parameter is empty @see #startProcess(String, long, String) startProcess - if setting your own Error handler is required.

method.name: startProcess
method.doc:
Used to invoke application-defined deferred process methods. Calls to this method return without waiting for the invoked process to complete (hence 'deferred' processing). However, the invocation of the deferred method is dependent on a successful commit of the the caller's transaction context. If the calling method's transaction rolls back, the deferred process will not be invoked (this safeguards application consistency).

Note: if this method is called outside of an Application Server, then the deferred process method call will be stored in a collection of deferred process method calls associated with the current transaction. At the end of the business interface method call, all of deferred process method calls made as part of the business interface call will be invoked synchronously (this is to allow unit testing of deferred processes).

The errorHandlerClassName parameter can be used to control what error handler gets invoked for this particular invocation. @param processName The name of the deferred process to be invoked. This is not the name of a class method, it is the process name as defined in the Curam Workflow Management System Developers Guide. @param instDataID The ID of a record on the WMInstanceData table. WMInstanceData is an application-defined table that is populated with information required by the deferred process. @param errorHandlerClassName The application-defined class which implements the TicketCallback interface and should be used to handle any errors occurring during invocation. @throws AppRuntimeException if a null or empty string is passed as a process name, or if the methods to start a deferred process or handle deferred process invocation errors cannot be found on the associated object. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED} - if a connection or session could not be created. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION} - if there is no connection to the named queue. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED} - if the JMS service reported any errors while trying to send the message. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#ID_ERR_DP_ENACTMENT ID_ERR_DP_ENACTMENT} - if any un-handled exceptions occur while enacting the deferred process. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_INVALID_PARAMETER_EXCEPTION RUN_ID_INVALID_PARAMETER_EXCEPTION} - if the processName parameter is empty

class.doc:
Provides facilities for application developers to invoke Business Process methods asynchronously. (Calls to asynchronous methods return without waiting for the invoked method to complete, hence 'deferred' processing).

See the Deferred Processing chapter of the Curam Workflow Management System Developers Guide for more information. @author PJ

class.name: JMSLiteEngine

method.name: main

field.name: kMessageTypeMessage
field.doc: JMSLite Message type.

field.name: kMessageTypeMapMessage
field.doc: JMSLite MapMessage type.

field.name: kMessageTypeTextMessage
field.doc: JMSLite TextMessage type.

class.doc:
A JMS engine designed to support JMS messaging in Curam during application development when the Curam server is run in a debug environment as a standalone application without the support of a full-fledged application server which would normally provide the JMS implementation.

There are many limitations in this implementation but there is sufficient to support Curam deferred processing and workflow. The implementation uses queues implemented by way of a table on the application database. The queues are thus persistent and transactional.

    Restrictions in the implementation include:
  • Support for Message, MapMessage and TextMessage only.
  • No ByteMessage, ObjectMessage or StreamMessage support.
  • No support for float, double or object properties in message headers
  • No support for float, double or object entries in MapMessage
  • Support for Queue destinations only -- no Topics
  • Only MDB consumers supported -- no JMS Receivers
  • No message acknowledgement
  • No Queue Browser support
  • No ConnectionConsumers
  • Correlation IDs as String only, not Bytes
  • No anonymous Queue senders
  • Only one instance of the JMS server can be run

JMSLiteEngine is intended to be run as a server. It requires a running JNDI implementation before it is started. Upon startup it registers Queues and a QueueConnectionFactory based on an array of queue and MDB names supplied from coreinf constants. It also prepares MDB instances to dispatch messages to.

@author Peter Swords

class.doc:
Superclass of all Curam MBeans. It is not mandatory for custom MBeans to inherit from this class but making this class their superclass they:
  • get access to fine grained notifications on application configuration changes
  • automatic management of updates to the configuration parameter that enables per user data collection
@author DMoraru

class.doc:
A utility class that holds and aggregates statistics for a positive numeric counter. Note that this class uses atomic variables and it should be used only when a large enough sample is expected in order for the calculated values to be a good approximation of the actual values.
@author DMoraru

field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_MONEY_CONVERSION. en = Money conversion error. Badly formatted money '%1s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_MULTIPLE_RECORDS
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_MULTIPLE_RECORDS. en = Not unique - a singleton SELECT returned multiple records.

field.name: RUN_ID_NO_FIDSID_ON_TABLE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NO_FIDSID_ON_TABLE. en = Invalid security data: SecurityIdentifier %1s is not linked to FunctionIdentifier %2s.

field.name: RUN_ID_NO_ID_FIELD
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NO_ID_FIELD. en = Data Access meta-data problem : there was no id field for auto id generation or the field was of the wrong type.

field.name: RUN_ID_NO_MAPPER_FOR_STRUCT
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NO_MAPPER_FOR_STRUCT. en = A static MQStructMapper class was not created for '%1s'. See the log for more information.

field.name: RUN_ID_NO_MAPPING_AVAILABLE_FOR_DATATYPE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NO_MAPPING_AVAILABLE_FOR_DATATYPE. en = A mapping class has not been defined for data type '%1s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_NO_VERSION_FIELD
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NO_VERSION_FIELD. en = Data Access meta-data problem : there was no version number field for optimistic locking or the field was of the wrong type.

field.name: RUN_ID_NUMBER_CONVERSION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_NUMBER_CONVERSION. en = Number conversion error. Badly formatted number '%1s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_OTHER_DATABASE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_OTHER_DATABASE. en = An un-handled database exception occurred. Please contact your administrator.

field.name: RUN_ID_OVERFLOW
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_OVERFLOW. en = Attempt to update a record with too large a value.

field.name: RUN_ID_PLACEHOLDER
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_PLACEHOLDER. en = Data Access meta-data problem : placeholder '%1s' has invalid format or does not match any field or appears in wrong order.

field.name: RUN_ID_PLACEHOLDER_CANT_USE_SECOND_PARAM
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_PLACEHOLDER_CANT_USE_SECOND_PARAM. en = Data Access meta-data problem : placeholder '%1s' cannot access second argument because this argument type is the same as the first. SQL='%2s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_PRIMARY_TRANS_CLOSED
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_PRIMARY_TRANS_CLOSED. en = The primary transaction has already been closed. Therefore it is no longer available to be rolled back or resumed.

field.name: RUN_ID_PROCESS_ENACTMENT_EVENT_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_PROCESS_ENACTMENT_EVENT_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE. en = The property cache could not be loaded.

field.name: RUN_ID_PROPERTY_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_PROPERTY_CACHE_LOAD_FAILURE. en = The property cache could not be loaded.

field.name: RUN_ID_READMULTI_MAX
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_READMULTI_MAX. en = The function could not be completed successfully as the number of records to be returned exceeded the maximum defined for this function.

field.name: RUN_ID_READMULTI_MAX_LOG
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_READMULTI_MAX_LOG. en = The number of records to be returned exceeds the maximum defined for this function. Returning large search results may impact performance of the Curam application and should be investigated.

field.name: RUN_ID_RECORD_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_RECORD_NOT_FOUND. en = Record not found.

field.name: RUN_ID_RUNTIME
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_RUNTIME. en = A runtime exception occurred: %1s.

field.name: RUN_ID_SECURITY_CACHE_FAILURE_CALLBACK_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SECURITY_CACHE_FAILURE_CALLBACK_ERROR. en = Security cache failure callback error.

field.name: RUN_ID_SECURITY_CACHE_OPEN_FAILURE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SECURITY_CACHE_OPEN_FAILURE. en = Security cache open failure.

field.name: RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_INVALID_MIN_SEARCH_STRING_PROPERTY_VALUE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_INVALID_MIN_SEARCH_STRING_PROPERTY_VALUE. en = The specified value for the property 'curam.security.identifier.minsearch.stringlength' is invalid. So the default value '2' is been set for this.

field.name: RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_MIN_SEARCH_STRING_LENGTH_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_MIN_SEARCH_STRING_LENGTH_ERROR. en = Identifier Name field must contain at least %1s characters.

field.name: RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_NULL_SEARCH_STRING_LENGTH_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SECURITY_IDENTIFIER_NULL_SEARCH_STRING_LENGTH_ERROR. en = You must specify some search criteria.

field.name: RUN_ID_SHORTNAME_DUPLICATE_EXCEPTION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SHORTNAME_DUPLICATE_EXCEPTION. en = The loaded ShortName.properties file contains duplicate entries. This must be resolved before continuing.

field.name: RUN_ID_SHORTNAME_SUBSTITUTION_EXCEPTION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_SHORTNAME_SUBSTITUTION_EXCEPTION. en = The field %1s cannot be shortened to the required length.\nThe furthest it could be substituted was '%2s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_STRING_TOO_LARGE_FOR_MESSAGE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_STRING_TOO_LARGE_FOR_MESSAGE. en = String cannot be encoded into a JMS message as its length %1s exceeds the permitted length of %2s for this field. Message data = '%3s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_TIMEOUT_FORMAT_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_TIMEOUT_FORMAT_ERROR. en = The invocation specific property '%1s' contains a invalid numeric value.

field.name: RUN_ID_TRANSACTION_CALLBACK_CLASS_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_TRANSACTION_CALLBACK_CLASS_NOT_FOUND. en = The transaction callback class cannot be instantiated because the "%1s" class specified by the "%2s" property cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: RUN_ID_UNIMPLEMENTED_STEREOTYPE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_UNIMPLEMENTED_STEREOTYPE. en = Data Access meta-data problem : unrecognized stereotype '%1s'. en_GB = Data Access meta-data problem : unrecognised stereotype '%1s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_DATABASE
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_DATABASE. en = The database type specified in the properties is unsupported.

field.name: RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_ENCODING
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_UNSUPPORTED_ENCODING. en = Encoding '%1s' is not supported.

field.name: RUN_ID_USERSCOPE_CONFIGURATION_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_USERSCOPE_CONFIGURATION_ERROR. en = User Scope is not configured correctly: %1s.

field.name: RUN_ID_USERSCOPE_NOT_CONFIGURED
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_USERSCOPE_NOT_CONFIGURED. en = Custom User Scope is not configured.

field.name: RUN_ID_USER_PREFERENCE_RETRIEVAL
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_USER_PREFERENCE_RETRIEVAL. en = Could not retrieve user preference '%1s' for user '%2s'.

field.name: RUN_ID_WS_REMOTE_EXCEPTION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_WS_REMOTE_EXCEPTION. en = A RemoteException occurred while trying to invoke web service.

field.name: RUN_ID_WS_SERVICE_EXCEPTION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_ID_WS_SERVICE_EXCEPTION. en = A ServiceException occurred while trying to locate web service.

field.name: RUN_STALE_DATABASE_CONNECTION
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_STALE_DATABASE_CONNECTION. en = The current database connection has become invalid, please try again.

field.name: RUN_TIMER_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: infrastructure:RUN_TIMER_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A timer with name '%1s' is already active.

field.name: TAB_CONFIG_IMPORT_FAILURE
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_CONFIG_IMPORT_FAILURE. en = An error occurred during the addition of the tab configuration resources to the database. Consult output for further information.

field.name: TAB_CONFIG_MERGE_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_CONFIG_MERGE_ERROR. en = The property %1s for %2s in component %3s has already been defined.

field.name: TAB_CONFIG_PROPERTY_LOCALE_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_CONFIG_PROPERTY_LOCALE_ERROR. en = The locale for property file %1s is not valid.

field.name: TAB_CONFIG_RESOURCE_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_CONFIG_RESOURCE_ERROR. en = An error occurred adding %1s from component %2s to the database: %3s.

field.name: TAB_CONFIG_VALIDATION_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_CONFIG_VALIDATION_ERROR. en = The %1s in component %2s is not valid : %3s

field.name: TAB_RESOURCE_ACCESS_ERROR
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_RESOURCE_ACCESS_ERROR. en = The requested %1s resource %2s could not be accessed. See nested exception for further details.

field.name: TAB_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: infrastructure:TAB_RESOURCE_NOT_FOUND. en = The requested %1s resource %2s could not be found.

class.name: PROCESSDEFINITIONTOOL

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The activity action with page identifier "%1s" contains at least one action link parameter with a blank name.

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_NOTIFICATION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_NOTIFICATION. en = The notification action with page id "%1s" contains at least one action link parameter with a blank name.

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_MUST_USE_LIST_ATTRIBUTE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_MUST_USE_LIST_ATTRIBUTE. en = At least one attribute from the listWDO "%1s" must be used as a link parameter for this action

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_ALREADY_USED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_ALREADY_USED. en = The link parameter name "%1s" is already specified for this activity action.

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The action link parameter name must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The action link parameter workflow data object attribute must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ACTION_PAGE_ID_CONTAINS_SPACES
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_PAGE_ID_CONTAINS_SPACES. en = The page identifier supplied for the action cannot contain spaces.

field.name: ID_ACTION_PAGE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_PAGE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The page identifier for the action must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ACTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The action text must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = An activity named "%1s" already exists for the "%2s" locale.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_HAS_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_HAS_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS. en = This activity has more than one incoming transition and cannot therefore have it's join type changed to 'NONE'. An activity with a join type of 'NONE' must have just one incoming transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_HAS_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_HAS_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS. en = This activity has more than one outgoing transition and cannot therefore have it's split type changed to 'NONE'. An activity with a split type of 'NONE' must have just one outgoing transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_PROCESS_DEFINITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_PROCESS_DEFINITION. en = The activity identifier %1s is not unique in the process definition. It is used to represent the following activities: %2s.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_IN_INCOMING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TRANSITION_MUST_HAVE_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_IN_INCOMING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TRANSITION_MUST_HAVE_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE. en = The activity "%1s" which is present on the far side of the incoming transition to the parallel activity "%2s" must have a split type of NONE.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_IN_OUTGOING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TRANSITION_MUST_HAVE_JOIN_TYPE_NONE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_IN_OUTGOING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TRANSITION_MUST_HAVE_JOIN_TYPE_NONE. en = The activity "%1s" which is present on the far side of the outgoing transition from the parallel activity "%2s" must have a join type of NONE.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_PLACEHOLDERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The subject text parameter cannot be added as all placeholders used in the subject text have already been mapped to workflow data object attributes.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_TYPE_SPECIFIED_NOT_KNOWN
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_TYPE_SPECIFIED_NOT_KNOWN. en = The activity type "%1s" supplied is not a known activity type.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITHOUT_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS_IS_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITHOUT_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS_IS_INVALID. en = This activity has no incoming transitions.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITHOUT_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS_IS_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITHOUT_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS_IS_INVALID. en = This activity has no outgoing transitions.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NONE_ALREADY_HAS_INCOMING_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NONE_ALREADY_HAS_INCOMING_TRANSITION. en = The target activity '%1s' has a join type of 'NONE' and already has an incoming transition. An activity with a join type of 'NONE' must have just one incoming transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NONE_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NONE_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS. en = An activity with a join type of 'NONE' must have just one incoming transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NOT_NONE_SINGLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_JOIN_TYPE_NOT_NONE_SINGLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITION. en = An activity with a join type of '%1s' must have more than one incoming transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE_ALREADY_HAS_OUTGOING_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE_ALREADY_HAS_OUTGOING_TRANSITION. en = The source activity '%1s' has a split type of 'NONE' and already has an outgoing transition. An activity with a split type of 'NONE' must have just one outgoing transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NONE_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS. en = An activity with a split type of 'NONE' must have just one outgoing transition.

field.name: ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NOT_NONE_SINGLE_INCOMING_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ACTIVITY_WITH_SPLIT_TYPE_NOT_NONE_SINGLE_INCOMING_TRANSITION. en = An activity with a split type of '%1s' must have more than one outgoing transition.

field.name: ID_ALLOCATION_REFERENCE_SPECIFIES_INCORRECT_RETURN_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ALLOCATION_REFERENCE_SPECIFIES_INCORRECT_RETURN_TYPE. en = The allocation function "%1s" must specify a return type of "%2s".

field.name: ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this allocation strategy cannot be refreshed since the business process object method cannot be found on the specified interface.

field.name: ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this allocation strategy cannot be refreshed since the business process object class is not an interface.

field.name: ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH. en = The input mappings for this allocation strategy cannot be refreshed since the business process object interface cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_DATA_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_DATA_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The answer data type must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_DATA_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_FREE_TEXT_ANSWER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_DATA_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_FREE_TEXT_ANSWER. en = The answer data type must be supplied for a question with a Free Form Answer.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A display name for the answer must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_FORMAT_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_FORMAT_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The answer format must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The answer with the answer name '%1s' already exists for this decision activity.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The answer name must be supplied.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER. en = The answer name '%1s' is not a valid Java identifier.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_NOT_SELECTED_VALUE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_NOT_SELECTED_VALUE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS. en = An answer not selected value must either be specified for all answers or else not specified for any answer.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_NOT_SELECTED_VALUE_TYPE_INCOMPATIBLE_WITH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_NOT_SELECTED_VALUE_TYPE_INCOMPATIBLE_WITH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE. en = The answer not selected value "%1s" mapped to the workflow data object attribute type "%2s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_OUTPUT_MAPPING_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_OUTPUT_MAPPING_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The workflow data object attribute must be specified for the answer output mapping if either the selected value or the not selected value has been specified.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_SELECTED_VALUE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_SELECTED_VALUE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS. en = An answer selected value must either be specified for all answers or else not specified for any answer.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_SELECTED_VALUE_TYPE_INCOMPATIBLE_WITH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_SELECTED_VALUE_TYPE_INCOMPATIBLE_WITH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE. en = The answer selected value "%1s" mapped to the workflow data object attribute type "%2s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID. en = The workflow data object attribute "%1s" specified for the answer output mapping is invalid.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ALL_ANSWERS_OR_NO_ANSWERS. en = A workflow data object attribute for answer output mappings must either be specified for all answers or else not specified for any answer.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_BOOLEAN_AND_SELECTED_VALUE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_BOOLEAN_AND_SELECTED_VALUE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The selected value for the answer must be specified if the workflow data object attribute specified for the answer output mapping is not a boolean.

field.name: ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_UNIQUE_WHILST_MULTIPLE_ANSWERS_ALLOWED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ANSWER_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_UNIQUE_WHILST_MULTIPLE_ANSWERS_ALLOWED. en = The workflow data object attributes used for answer output mappings must be unique when the allow multiple selection flag for the question is set to true.

field.name: ID_ASYNC_SUBFLOW_WITH_TRANS_FROM_CONDITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ASYNC_SUBFLOW_WITH_TRANS_FROM_CONDITION. en = A transition from an asynchronous subflow activity cannot have a condition defined for it.

field.name: ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this automatic activity cannot be refreshed since the business process object method cannot be found on the specified interface.

field.name: ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this automatic activity cannot be refreshed since the business process object class is not an interface.

field.name: ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH. en = The input mappings for this automatic activity cannot be refreshed since the business process object interface cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_OF_TYPE_LONG
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_OF_TYPE_LONG. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" specified in a business object association mapping for this activity is not assignable to a type LONG.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND. en = The interface "%1s" specified as the business process object for the allocation strategy function associated with the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The class "%1s" specified as the business process object for the allocation strategy function associated with the activity "%2s" is not an interface.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND. en = The interface "%1s" specified as the business process object associated with the automatic activity "%2s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The class "%1s" specified as the business process object associated with the automatic activity "%2s" is not an interface.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_FOUND. en = The interface "%1s" specified as the business process object associated with the deadline handler for the event wait of the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The class "%1s" specified as the business process object associated with the deadline handler for the event wait of the activity "%2s" is not an interface.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND. en = The interface "%1s" specified as the business process object for the allocation strategy function associated with the notification for the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The class "%1s" specified as the business process object for the allocation strategy function associated with the notification for the activity "%2s" is not an interface.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_REMINDER_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_REMINDER_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND. en = The interface "%1s" specified as the business process object for the allocation strategy function associated with a reminder notification for the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_CLASS_DEFINED_FOR_REMINDER_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_INTERFACE

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_CLASS_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH. en = The business process object with the fully qualified name of "%1s" cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_BPO_FIELD_MAPPING_MISMATCH

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_FOUND. en = The method "%1s" specified as the business process object method associated with the automatic activity "%2s" cannot be found on the specified interface "%3s".

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_FOUND. en = The business process object method "%1s" specified as the deadline handler for the event wait of the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the specified interface "%3s".

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_REMINDER_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_DEFINED_FOR_REMINDER_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_FOUND. en = The method "%1s" specified as the business process object method for the allocation strategy function associated with a reminder notification for the activity "%2s" cannot be found on the specified interface "%3s".

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_DOES_NOT_SPECIFY_VALID_INTERFACE_OR_METHOD

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_NAME_FOR_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A method name must be specified for this allocation strategy.

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_NAME_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_NAME_FOR_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A method name must be specified for this automatic activity.

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_NAME_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_NAME_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A method name must be specified for this deadline handler.

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_DUPLICATE_ENTRY_PRESENT. en = The interface "%1s" with method "%2s" already exists in this specified category with this specified type. A business process object method cannot be referenced twice in the same category with the same type.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_INTERFACE_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = An interface name must be specified.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_INTERFACE_NAME_NOT_VALID. en = The interface name "%1s" specified is not valid.

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_METHOD_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_METHOD_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A method name must be specified.

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_METHOD_NAME_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_METHOD_NAME_NOT_FOUND. en = The method "%1s" cannot be found on the interface "%2s".

field.name: ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_METHOD_REFERENCE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A method type must be specified.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_PARAMETER_MAPPED_TO_INDEX_LIST_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = The indexed list workflow data object attribute, "%1s", cannot be mapped to this parameter as this activity is not in a loop.

field.name: ID_BPO_PARAMETER_MAPPING_MISMATCH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_PARAMETER_MAPPING_MISMATCH. en = The type of the workflow data object attribute "%1s" does not match the type of this parameter.

field.name: ID_BPO_SPECIFIED_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_INTERFACE_NAME_OR_METHOD_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_BPO_SPECIFIED_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_INTERFACE_NAME_OR_METHOD_NAME. en = The specified business process object method is invalid as either the interface name or method name has not been specified.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_TYPE_SUPPLIED. en = Unable to create the business object association. A business object type must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = Unable to create the business object association. A workflow data object attribute must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = Unable to create the business object association. The selected business object type is already associated with the workflow data object attribute "%1s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = Unable to create the business object association. The selected workflow data object attribute "%1s" is already associated with a business object type.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The localized text entry cannot be added because an entry already exists for this locale en_GB = The localised text entry cannot be added because an entry already exists for this locale

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_SUBJECT_TEXT_PARAMETER_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_SUBJECT_TEXT_PARAMETER_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SPECIFIED. en = A workflow data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_ADD_TEXT_PARAMETER_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_ADD_TEXT_PARAMETER_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = The text parameter cannot be created. Please select a workflow data object attribute.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_BPO_METHOD_NOT_SET
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_BPO_METHOD_NOT_SET. en = An output mapping associated with this automatic activity "%1s" cannot be created as the business process object method has not been set.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_FIELD_ALREADY_MAPPED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_FIELD_ALREADY_MAPPED. en = An output mapping already exists for the field "%1s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_FIELD_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_BPO_OUTPUT_MAPPING_FIELD_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A field name must be specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_REQUIRED_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_DEFINED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_REQUIRED_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_DEFINED. en = Enactment mappings cannot be created for the workflow process definition "%1s" version "%2s" as no workflow data object attributes have been marked as required for enactment.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_REMINDER_WITH_NO_DEADLINE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_REMINDER_WITH_NO_DEADLINE_SPECIFIED. en = A reminder cannot be created if a deadline handler has not been specified or the complete activity indicator is not set to true

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A workflow data object attribute called "%1s" already exists in the workflow data object "%2s" on workflow process "%3s", version "%4s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_CREATE_WDO_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_CREATE_WDO_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A workflow data object cannot be created with the name "%1s". The workflow process "%2s", version "%3s' already contains a workflow data object with this name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DEFINE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_AS_CONSTANT_AND_REQUIRED_FOR_ENACTMENT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DEFINE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_AS_CONSTANT_AND_REQUIRED_FOR_ENACTMENT. en = The WDO attribute "%1s" cannot be both required for enactment and a constant.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DEFINE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_AS_CONSTANT_AND_INITIAL
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DEFINE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_AS_CONSTANT_AND_INITIAL. en = The workflow data object attribute "%1s" cannot have both a constant and initial value specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST. en = The description for this activity has been localized.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY. en = The default localized text entry cannot be deleted. en_GB = The default localised text entry cannot be deleted.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST. en = The description for this process has been localized.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_WDO_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_DEFAULT_WDO_DESCRIPTION_OTHER_LOCALES_EXIST. en = The description for this workflow data object has been localized.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_MAPPINGS_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_MAPPINGS_EXIST. en = Enactment mappings cannot be deleted for the workflow process definition "%1s" version "%2s" as no enactment mappings have been defined.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_BPO_OUTPUT_FIELDS_MAPPINGS_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_BPO_OUTPUT_FIELDS_MAPPINGS_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The list of business process object method output fields cannot be displayed as the business process object method associated with the automatic activity "%1s" has not been specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_TYPE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_TYPE_SUPPLIED. en = Unable to edit the business object association. A business object type must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = Unable to edit the business object association. A workflow data object attribute must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_TYPE_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = Unable to edit the business object association. The selected business object type is already associated with the workflow data object attribute "%1s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = Unable to edit the business object association. The selected workflow data object attribute "%1s" is already associated with a business object type.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_LOCALIZED_TEXT_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The locale for a localized text entry cannot be modified to a locale that is already in use. en_GB = The locale for a localised text entry cannot be modified to a locale that is already in use.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_EDIT_OUTPUT_MAPPING_BPO_METHOD_CONTAINS_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_EDIT_OUTPUT_MAPPING_BPO_METHOD_CONTAINS_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The specified output mapping cannot be edited as the business process object method associated with this automatic activity does not contain an output parameter. The mapping must therefore be deleted or alternatively the BPO method associated this automatic activity must be changed.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_FIND_TEXT_FOR_DEFAULT_LOCALE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_FIND_TEXT_FOR_DEFAULT_LOCALE. en = Cannot find the default locale for this localized text. en_GB = Cannot find the default locale for this localised text.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MAP_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_TO_CONSTANT_VALUE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MAP_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_TO_CONSTANT_VALUE. en = The WDO attribute "%1s" cannot be used in an output mapping as it is a constant value.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_BPO_METHOD_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_BPO_METHOD_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A business process object method must be specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_ENACTMENT_MAPPING_STRUCT_FIELD_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_ENACTMENT_MAPPING_STRUCT_FIELD_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The name of the Curam struct field must be specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_ENACTMENT_MAPPING_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE_MISMATCH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_ENACTMENT_MAPPING_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_TYPE_MISMATCH. en = Cannot map the workflow data object attribute "%1s" of type "%2s" to the attribute "%3s" of type "%4s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_OVERLOADED_BPO_METHOD_TYPES_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_OVERLOADED_BPO_METHOD_TYPES_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = The list of parameter type names associated with this overloaded method must be specified.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_PROCESS_UNRELEASED_VERSION_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_PROCESS_UNRELEASED_VERSION_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The released workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" cannot be modified as an unreleased version of this process already exists.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_NO_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_NO_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_SUPPLIED. en = A workflow process must be specified as a subflow.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CORRUPT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CORRUPT. en = The workflow process selected is corrupt and cannot be loaded.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_NOT_RELEASED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_NOT_RELEASED. en = The workflow process specified must have at least one released version.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_FIELD_NO_LONGER_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_FIELD_NO_LONGER_EXISTS. en = The return field "%1s" no longer exists in the business process object method definition.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The attribute cannot be modified with the name "%1s". The workflow data object "%2s" already contains an attribute with this name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_MODIFY_WDO_WITH_THIS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The workflow data object cannot be modified with the name "%1s". The workflow process "%2s", version "%3s" already contains a workflow data object with this name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID. en = The input mappings for this allocation strategy cannot be refreshed since the business process object method assigned to it does not specify a valid interface or method name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID. en = The input mappings for this automatic activity cannot be refreshed since the business process object method assigned to it does not specify a valid interface or method name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_INVALID. en = The input mappings associated with this deadline handler cannot be refreshed since the business process object method assigned to it does not specify a valid interface or method name.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_MAPPINGS_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NO_MAPPINGS_EXIST. en = Enactment mappings cannot be refreshed for the workflow process definition "%1s" version "%2s" as no enactment mappings have been defined.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_INPUT_PARAMETERS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REFRESH_INPUT_PARAMETERS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The input parameters associated with the specified method cannot be refreshed as the business process object method has not been set.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_RELEASE_INVALID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_RELEASE_INVALID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS. en = This workflow process is not valid and cannot therefore be released.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_REORDER_ITEM_AS_ONLY_ONE_ITEM_DEFINED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_REORDER_ITEM_AS_ONLY_ONE_ITEM_DEFINED. en = The specified item cannot be reordered as only a single item of this type exists and hence there are no items to insert it before.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_SPECIFY_REMINDER_WITH_NO_DEADLINE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_SPECIFY_REMINDER_WITH_NO_DEADLINE_SPECIFIED. en = A reminder cannot be specified if a deadline handler has not been specified or the complete activity indicator is not set to true

field.name: ID_CANNOT_SYNCHRONIZE_WDO_NO_ENTRY_IN_TEMPLATE_LIBRARY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_SYNCHRONIZE_WDO_NO_ENTRY_IN_TEMPLATE_LIBRARY. en = The synchronization of the workflow data object with the template library cannot be performed as no entry exists in the library with the name "%1s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_UNMARSHAL_WDO_OBJECT_FROM_XML
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_UNMARSHAL_WDO_OBJECT_FROM_XML. en = An error occurred creating a workflow data object from the given XML string.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_UNMARSHAL_WDO_TEMPLATE_XML
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CANNOT_UNMARSHAL_WDO_TEMPLATE_XML. en = An error occurred loading the workflow data object template XML document.

field.name: ID_COMPLETE_ACTIVITY_FLAG_CANNOT_BE_SET_FOR_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_COMPLETE_ACTIVITY_FLAG_CANNOT_BE_SET_FOR_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY. en = As model deadlines are not supported for parallel activities, the complete activity if deadline timeout reached flag cannot be set to true for this parallel activity.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_CANNOT_REFERENCE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_CONTEXT_WDOS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_CANNOT_REFERENCE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_CONTEXT_WDOS. en = The transition condition between "%1s" and "%2s" cannot reference both "%3s" and "%4s". These are mutually-exclusive Objects, they cannot exist simultaneously at runtime.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_NO_COMPARISON_OPERATOR_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_NO_COMPARISON_OPERATOR_SUPPLIED. en = A comparison operator must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_NO_FUNCTION_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_NO_FUNCTION_SUPPLIED. en = A function must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_NO_OPERATOR_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_NO_OPERATOR_SUPPLIED. en = A conditional operator must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_OR_CONSTANT_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_OR_CONSTANT_SUPPLIED. en = A constant OR a workflow data object attribute must be supplied for the right hand side of the condition.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = A workflow data object attribute must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_ON_ALL_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_ON_ALL_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS. en = This activity has a condition on all outgoing transitions. This workflow could stall if none of these conditions have been satisfied.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_OPERATOR_CANNOT_APPLY_TO_OPERAND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_OPERATOR_CANNOT_APPLY_TO_OPERAND. en = The data item condition "%2s %1s %3s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_UNARY_OPERATOR_CANNOT_APPLY_TO_OPERAND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_UNARY_OPERATOR_CANNOT_APPLY_TO_OPERAND. en = The function "%1s" cannot be applied to the workflow data object attribute "%2s". Please ensure the workflow data object attribute is of the required type.

field.name: ID_CONDITION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_AND_CONSTANT_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONDITION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_AND_CONSTANT_SUPPLIED. en = Either a constant OR a workflow data object attribute must be supplied.

field.name: ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The conditional operator for the loop condition function expression "%1s" with identifier "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The conditional operator for the data item condition expression with identifier "%1s" for the transition "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONJUNCTION_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The conditional operator for the function condition expression with identifier "%1s" for the transition "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_CONTEXT_LOOP_WDO_USED_IN_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CONTEXT_LOOP_WDO_USED_IN_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = The context loop workflow data object "%1s" cannot be used for the business object association mapping as the activity containing the mapping is not in a loop.

field.name: ID_CREATING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CREATING_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The parallel activity type must be specified when creating a parallel activity.

field.name: ID_CURAM_STRUCT_FIELD_DOES_NOT_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CURAM_STRUCT_FIELD_DOES_NOT_EXIST. en = The field "%1s" of the Curam struct "%2s" does not exist.

field.name: ID_CURAM_STRUCT_NAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CURAM_STRUCT_NAME_DOES_NOT_EXIST. en = The Curam struct "%1s" does not exist.

field.name: ID_CURAM_STRUCT_NAME_NOT_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_CURAM_STRUCT_NAME_NOT_VALID. en = The Curam struct name "%1s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_SPECIFIED_BY_WDO_OR_VALUE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_SPECIFIED_BY_WDO_OR_VALUE. en = The duration of the deadline may be specified in seconds or by using a workflow data object attribute mapping, but not both.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_INTEGER_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_INTEGER_TYPE. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" is not a valid workflow data object attribute for a deadline duration mapping.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_WITHOUT_HANDLER_OR_COMPLETE_ACTIVITY_TRUE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_DURATION_WITHOUT_HANDLER_OR_COMPLETE_ACTIVITY_TRUE. en = Either a deadline handler has not been specified or the complete activity indicator is false.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_METHOD_NOT_ON_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this deadline handler cannot be refreshed since the business process object method cannot be found on the specified interface.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_INTERFACE. en = The input mappings for this deadline handler cannot be refreshed since the business process object class is not an interface.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH. en = The input mappings for this deadline handler cannot be refreshed since the business process object interface cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_INVALID. en = The business process object method specified as the deadline handler for the event wait of this activity is invalid.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_NOT_ON_CLASSPATH. en = Either the business process object class "%1s" specified as the deadline handler for the event wait of this activity cannot be found on the classpath or the method "%2s" cannot be found on the specified class.

field.name: ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_WITHOUT_DURATION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_WITHOUT_DURATION. en = A duration for the deadline handler must be specified.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_OUTPUT_PARAMETER_MAPPINGS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_OUTPUT_PARAMETER_MAPPINGS. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" is used more than once in the list of output parameter mappings.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_PLACEHOLDER_HAS_DIFFERENT_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_PLACEHOLDER_HAS_DIFFERENT_TYPE. en = This text contains duplicated placeholders, but the parameter types in the duplicated placeholders are different.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_RDO_MAPPED_IN_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_RDO_MAPPED_IN_ACTIVITY_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY. en = The rule data object attribute "%1s" already exists in the activity allocation strategy.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_RDO_MAPPED_IN_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_RDO_MAPPED_IN_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY. en = The rule data object attribute "%1s" already exists in the activity notification allocation strategy.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_FOR_EVENT_TYPE_AND_RAISED_BY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_FOR_EVENT_TYPE_AND_RAISED_BY. en = The workflow data object attribute '%1s' cannot be used for both 'raised by' and 'event type' output data mappings.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_TEMPLATE_ATTRIBUTE_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_TEMPLATE_ATTRIBUTE_NAME. en = An attribute with this name already exists in the template.

field.name: ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_TEMPLATE_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DUPLICATE_WDO_TEMPLATE_NAME. en = A template with this name already exists.

field.name: ID_DURATION_EXPIRED_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DURATION_EXPIRED_MUST_BE_BOOLEAN. en = The duration expired field must contain a boolean.

field.name: ID_DURATION_EXPIRY_TIME_MUST_BE_DATETIME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_DURATION_EXPIRY_TIME_MUST_BE_DATETIME. en = The duration expiry time field must contain a DateTime.

field.name: ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_INSUFFICIENT_FOR_ENACTMENT_FROM_EVENT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_INSUFFICIENT_FOR_ENACTMENT_FROM_EVENT. en = The event with class "%1s", type "%2s" is registered to enact this workflow process. However, the process definition enactment mappings can no longer be fully populated from the event data associated with this event. Either remove the event enactment registration, or modify the enactment mappings as required.

field.name: ID_END_PROCESS_HAS_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_END_PROCESS_HAS_MULTIPLE_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS. en = The end process activity has more than one incoming transition and cannot therefore have it's join type changed to 'NONE'. An end process activity with a join type of 'NONE' must have just one incoming transition.

field.name: ID_END_PROCESS_INVALID_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_END_PROCESS_INVALID_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS. en = The end process activity should not specify any outgoing transitions.

field.name: ID_END_PROCESS_JOIN_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_END_PROCESS_JOIN_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A join type must be specified for the end process activity.

field.name: ID_EVENT_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The event %1s with match data %2s has already been added.

field.name: ID_EVENT_DUPLICATED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_DUPLICATED. en = The event %1s with match data %2s has been defined twice.

field.name: ID_EVENT_FOR_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_CANNOT_BE_USED_IN_ANOTHER_EVENT_WAIT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_FOR_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_CANNOT_BE_USED_IN_ANOTHER_EVENT_WAIT. en = The event type "%1s" is specified as a multiple occurring event therefore it cannot be used again on the same activity.

field.name: ID_EVENT_IDENTIFIERS_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_EVENT_DATA
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_IDENTIFIERS_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_EVENT_DATA. en = The event identifier %1s is not unique in the event data associated with the activity with identifier %2s. It is used for the following events: %3s.

field.name: ID_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_INVALID_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_INVALID_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = An indexed item from a list workflow data object cannot be used as the event match data as the activity associated with this mapping is not contained within a loop.

field.name: ID_EVENT_MATCH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_LONG_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_MATCH_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_LONG_TYPE. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" is not a valid workflow data object attribute for an activity event match data mapping.

field.name: ID_EVENT_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = An event must be specified.

field.name: ID_EVENT_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_NOT_FOUND. en = Unable to retrieve the selected event. The event may no longer exist.

field.name: ID_EVENT_OUTPUT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_EVENT_OUTPUT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_INVALID_TYPE. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" is not a valid workflow data object attribute for an activity event output mapping.

field.name: ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_INDICES_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_MAPPING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_INDICES_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_MAPPING. en = The formal parameter indexes defined for the allocation strategy function are not unique.

field.name: ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_INDICES_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_MAPPING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_INDICES_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_MAPPING. en = The formal parameter indexes defined for the business process object method are not unique.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_INDICES_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_DEADLINE_HANDLER_MAPPING. en = The formal parameter indexes defined for the deadline handler method are not unique.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_STRUCT_TYPE_FOR_ALLOCATION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The type of the struct formal parameter with the index of "%1s" for this allocation function cannot be blank.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_FORMAL_PARAMETER_STRUCT_TYPE_FOR_DEADLINE_HANDLER_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The type of the struct formal parameter with the index of "%1s" for this deadline handler function cannot be blank.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_IDENTIFIER_FOR_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The identifier for the allocation strategy cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_IMPORTED_WORKFLOW_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_IMPORTED_WORKFLOW_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The identifier of the imported workflow process definition with name %1s does not match the identifier of the existing entry (%2s). This can be corrected by changing the name or the identifier of the process definition to be imported.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INDEXED_ITEM_FROM_LIST_WDO_USED_IN_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOC_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = The indexed item from a list workflow data object "%1s" cannot be used for the business object association mapping as the activity containing the mapping is not in a loop.

field.name: ID_INITIAL_COMMENT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_STRING_TYPE

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_BPO_SPECIFIED_DOES_NOT_CONTAIN_INTERFACE_NAME_OR_METHOD_NAME. en = The specified business process object method is invalid as either the interface name or method name has not been specified.

field.name: ID_INVALID_DATA_ITEM_TRANSITION_CONDITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_DATA_ITEM_TRANSITION_CONDITION. en = The transition data item condition "%1s" is invalid.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_DEADLINE_HANDLER. en = The deadline handler "%1s" specified is not valid.

field.name: ID_INVALID_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_WDO. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" mapped to the event match data is invalid.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_WDO_INDEXED_ITEM_FROM_LIST_WDO_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = The indexed item from a list workflow data object "%1s" cannot be used as the event match data for the event "%2s" as the associated activity is not contained within a loop.

field.name: ID_INVALID_EVENT_TYPE_DATA_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_FUNCTION_CONDITION_TRANSITION_CONDITION. en = The transition function condition "%1s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_INVALID_FUNCTION_LOOP_CONDITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_FUNCTION_LOOP_CONDITION. en = The loop function condition "%1s" is invalid.

field.name: ID_INVALID_INITIAL_COMMENT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_INITIAL_COMMENT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" used as a mapping for the initial comment of this activity is invalid.

field.name: ID_INVALID_INPUT_SUBFLOW_MAPPING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_INPUT_SUBFLOW_MAPPING. en = The subflow input mapping containing the subflow workflow data object attribute to set, "%1s", is invalid.

field.name: ID_INVALID_LIST_WDO_MAPPED_TO_LINK_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_LIST_WDO_MAPPED_TO_LINK_PARAMETER. en = The list WDO "%1s" attached to a link parameter has not been defined for multiple occurring actions.

field.name: ID_INVALID_LIST_WDO_MAPPED_TO_TEXT_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_LIST_WDO_MAPPED_TO_TEXT_PARAMETER. en = The list WDO "%1s" attached to a text parameter has not been defined for multiple occurring actions.

field.name: ID_INVALID_LOOP_CONDITION_PARENTHESIS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_LOOP_CONDITION_PARENTHESIS. en = The parenthesis in the loop condition "%1s" are not matching.

field.name: ID_INVALID_MAPPING_OF_ATTRIBUTE_TO_PLACEHOLDER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_MAPPING_OF_ATTRIBUTE_TO_PLACEHOLDER. en = The placeholder "%1s" is incompatible with the mapped variable "%2s".

field.name: ID_INVALID_NOTIFICATION_FUNCTION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY

field.name: ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_ACTION_PLACEHOLDERS

field.name: ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_NOTIFICATION_ACTION_PLACEHOLDERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_NOTIFICATION_ACTION_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The number of placeholders used in the notification action text does not equal the number of mapped workflow data object attributes.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_NOTIFICATION_BODY_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The number of placeholders used in the notification body text does not equal the number of mapped workflow data object attributes for all locales.

field.name: ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT_PLACEHOLDERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The number of placeholders used in the notification subject text does not equal the number of mapped workflow data object attributes for all locales.

field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_QUESTION_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The number of placeholders used in the question text does not equal the number of mapped workflow data object attributes for all locales.

field.name: ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_SUBJECT_PLACEHOLDERS

field.name: ID_INVALID_RDO_IN_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_INPUT_MAPPING

Therefore an attribute from a list workflow data object cannot be specified as the event match data.
