field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PARALLEL_MANUAL_ACTIVITY_ACTION_TEXT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PARALLEL_MANUAL_ACTIVITY_ACTION_TEXT. en = There is no default locale entry for the action "%1s" for the parallel manual activity with identifier "%2s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PARALLEL_MANUAL_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PARALLEL_MANUAL_ACTIVITY_SUBJECT. en = There is no default locale entry for the parallel manual activity subject for the activity with identifier "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION. en = There is no default locale entry for the process description for the process "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_ACTION_TEXT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_ACTION_TEXT. en = There is no default locale entry for the action text for action "%1s" in reminder "%2s" for the activity with identifier "%3s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_BODY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_BODY. en = There is no default locale entry for the body of reminder "%1s" attached to the activity with identifier "%2s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_SUBJECT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_REMINDER_SUBJECT. en = There is no default locale entry for the subject of reminder "%1s" attached to the activity with identifier "%2s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_DISPLAY_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_DISPLAY_NAME. en = There is no default locale entry for the attribute display name for attribute "%1s" in the workflow data object "%2s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_DESCRIPTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_DESCRIPTION. en = There is no default locale entry for the description for workflow data object "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_DISPLAY_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_DEFAULT_LOCALE_ENTRY_FOR_WDO_DISPLAY_NAME. en = There is no default locale entry for the display name for workflow data object "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_REQUIRED_FOR_SUBFLOW_PROCESS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_REQUIRED_FOR_SUBFLOW_PROCESS. en = The workflow process referenced by this subflow activity requires no enactment mappings.

field.name: ID_NO_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DEFINED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DEFINED. en = The process definition must contain one end process activity.

field.name: ID_NO_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_JOIN_TYPE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_JOIN_TYPE_SPECIFIED. en = The end process activity does not specify an end process join type.

field.name: ID_NO_EVENTS_LISTED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_EVENTS_LISTED. en = A least one Event must be added to the Event Wait Information.

field.name: ID_NO_INTIAL_VALUE_DEFINED_FOR_INITIAL_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_INTIAL_VALUE_DEFINED_FOR_INITIAL_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE. en = An initial value must be specified for the attribute type "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_LOOP_CONDITION_FOR_LOOP_BEGIN_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_LOOP_CONDITION_FOR_LOOP_BEGIN_ACTIVITY. en = A loop condition must be defined for the loop begin activity.

field.name: ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_SPECIFIED. en = The notification allocation strategy must be supplied.

field.name: ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_BODY_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_BODY_SPECIFIED. en = The body text of the notification must be supplied.

field.name: ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_DELIVERY_MECHANISM_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_DELIVERY_MECHANISM_SPECIFIED. en = A delivery mechanism of the notification must be supplied.

field.name: ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_NOTIFICATION_SUBJECT_SPECIFIED. en = A notification subject must be defined.

field.name: ID_NO_RULESET_IDENTIFIER_SET
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_RULESET_IDENTIFIER_SET. en = The rule set has not yet been specified, so no rule set data object names can be listed.

field.name: ID_NO_RULESET_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_RULESET_SPECIFIED. en = A mapping cannot be created because no rule set has been specified.

field.name: ID_NO_START_ACTIVITY_DEFINED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_START_ACTIVITY_DEFINED. en = The workflow process must have a start process activity defined.

field.name: ID_NO_START_PROCESS_SPLIT_TYPE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_START_PROCESS_SPLIT_TYPE_SPECIFIED. en = The start process activity does not specify a start process split type.

field.name: ID_NO_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_REFERENCE_DEFINED_FOR_SUBFLOW_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_REFERENCE_DEFINED_FOR_SUBFLOW_ACTIVITY. en = A subflow process reference has not been defined for this subflow activity. Every subflow activity must contain a reference to a valid workflow process definition that contains at least one released version.

field.name: ID_NO_TEXT_FOR_SERVER_DEFAULT_LOCALE_FOR_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_TEXT_FOR_SERVER_DEFAULT_LOCALE_FOR_PROCESS_DESCRIPTION. en = The description of the workflow process cannot be found for the server locale "%1s".

field.name: ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPED_TO_INPUT_BASE_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPED_TO_INPUT_BASE_PARAMETER. en = There is no workflow data object attribute mapped to the input parameter "%1s" of the business process object method.

field.name: ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPED_TO_INPUT_STRUCT_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MAPPED_TO_INPUT_STRUCT_PARAMETER. en = There is no workflow data object attribute mapped to the input parameter "%1s", field "%2s" of the business process object method.

field.name: ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SPECIFIED_FOR_EVENT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SPECIFIED_FOR_EVENT. en = A workflow data object attribute must be specified for the event.

field.name: ID_OPERATOR_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_OPERATOR_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The operator for the loop condition data item expression "%1s" with identifier "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_OPERATOR_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_OPERATOR_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The operator for the data item condition expression with identifier "%1s" for the transition "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ASYNCHRONOUS_SUBFLOW
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_CANNOT_BE_SPECIFIED_FOR_ASYNCHRONOUS_SUBFLOW. en = Output Mappings cannot be specified for an asynchronous subflow activity.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_INVALID_LIST_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_INVALID_LIST_WDO. en = The list workflow data object associated with the parallel activity is invalid.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_JOIN_TYPE_MUST_BE_TYPE_NONE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_JOIN_TYPE_MUST_BE_TYPE_NONE. en = The join type for a parallel activity must be of type NONE.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_LIST_WDO_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_LIST_WDO_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A list workflow data object must be specified for the parallel activity.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_MUST_HAVE_ONLY_ONE_INBOUND_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_MUST_HAVE_ONLY_ONE_INBOUND_TRANSITION. en = A parallel activity must have exactly one inbound transition.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_MUST_HAVE_ONLY_ONE_OUTBOUND_TRANSITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_MUST_HAVE_ONLY_ONE_OUTBOUND_TRANSITION. en = A parallel activity must have exactly one outbound transition.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_SPLIT_TYPE_MUST_BE_TYPE_NONE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_SPLIT_TYPE_MUST_BE_TYPE_NONE. en = The split type for a parallel activity must be of type NONE.

field.name: ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_WDO_MUST_BE_LIST_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PARALLEL_ACTIVITY_WDO_MUST_BE_LIST_WDO. en = The workflow data object associated with this parallel activity is not a list workflow data object.

field.name: ID_PRIORITY_SPECIFIED_BY_WDO_OR_CODETABLE_VALUE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PRIORITY_SPECIFIED_BY_WDO_OR_CODETABLE_VALUE. en = The priority of the task may be specified using a codetable code value or a workflow data object attribute mapping, but not both.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_BLOCK_HAS_MULTIPLE_ENDPOINTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_BLOCK_HAS_MULTIPLE_ENDPOINTS. en = The block that begins at %1s does not have a unique endpoint. It can be ended at either %2s (on the path {%3s}) or %4s (on the path {%5s}). A block must always end at the same point, regardless which path is taken from it.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_CATEGORY_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_CATEGORY_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A process category must be specified.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_DEFINITION_NOT_FOUND. en = The workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" cannot be found.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_ALREADY_EXIST_CANNOT_CREATE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_ALREADY_EXIST_CANNOT_CREATE. en = Enactment mappings have already been created for the workflow process definition "%1s" version "%2s".

field.name: ID_PROCESS_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_IDENTIFIER_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_IDENTIFIER_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The identifier associated with the failure allocation strategy cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_TYPE_TARGET
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_FAILURE_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_TYPE_TARGET. en = The failure allocation strategy for a process definition must have an allocation strategy type of TARGET.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_GRAPH_MUST_BE_CONNECTED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_GRAPH_MUST_BE_CONNECTED. en = The following activities are not reachable from the Start Activity: {%1s}.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_HAS_DUPLICATE_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_HAS_DUPLICATE_UNIQUE_IDENTIFIERS. en = Unable to import process due to duplicate unique identifiers within the process definition: %1s

field.name: ID_PROCESS_HAS_UNTERMINATED_BLOCK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_HAS_UNTERMINATED_BLOCK. en = The block that begins at %1s is not properly closed before %2s on the path {%3s}.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_NAME_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A workflow process definition named "%1s" already exists.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH. en = The length of the name of the specified workflow process "%1s" is "%2n". The maximum allowed length for a workflow process name is "%3n".

field.name: ID_PROCESS_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_NAME_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = A process name must be specified.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_NOT_EXPOSED_AS_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_NOT_EXPOSED_AS_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_SPECIFIED. en = The callback service class name "%1s" cannot be specified as the workflow process has not been exposed as a web service.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_OUTPUT_FLAG_SET_TO_TRUE_PROCESS_NOT_EXPOSED_AS_WEBSERVICE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_OUTPUT_FLAG_SET_TO_TRUE_PROCESS_NOT_EXPOSED_AS_WEBSERVICE. en = The process output flag cannot be set to true for the workflow data object attribute "%1s" as the workflow process has not been exposed as a web service.

field.name: ID_PROCESS_SHOULD_NOT_CONTAIN_CYCLES
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_PROCESS_SHOULD_NOT_CONTAIN_CYCLES. en = A cycle has been found in the process at activity "%1s".

field.name: ID_QUESTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_QUESTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The question text must be supplied.

field.name: ID_RDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A rules data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_RDO_MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RDO_MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A mapping already exists for the rules data object attribute "%1s".

field.name: ID_RDO_MAPPING_NOT_IN_RULESET
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RDO_MAPPING_NOT_IN_RULESET. en = The rule data object attribute "%1s" is not required in rule set "%2s".

field.name: ID_REMINDER_DELIVERY_OFFSET_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REMINDER_DELIVERY_OFFSET_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The delivery offset has not been specified for the reminder with identifier "%1s" attached to the activity with identifier "%2s".

field.name: ID_REMINDER_DELIVERY_TIME_GREATER_THAN_DEADLINE_TIMEOUT_INTERVAL
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REMINDER_DELIVERY_TIME_GREATER_THAN_DEADLINE_TIMEOUT_INTERVAL. en = The specified reminder delivery time is greater than the deadline timeout interval.

field.name: ID_REMINDER_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_IN_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REMINDER_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_IN_ACTIVITY. en = The activity "%1s" has the following non-unique reminder identifiers "%2s".

field.name: ID_REMINDER_MAPPED_DELIVERY_TIME_OR_VALUE_REQUIRED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REMINDER_MAPPED_DELIVERY_TIME_OR_VALUE_REQUIRED. en = The reminder delivery time may be specified in seconds or by using a workflow data object attribute mapping, but not both.

field.name: ID_REQUIERED_CODETABLE_CODE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REQUIERED_CODETABLE_CODE_DOES_NOT_EXIST. en = The code %1s is referenced by the process definition but does not exist in codetable %2s.

field.name: ID_REQUIRED_CODETABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_REQUIRED_CODETABLE_DOES_NOT_EXIST. en = The codetable %1s is required by the Process Definition Tool.

field.name: ID_RHS_OF_DATA_ITEM_LOOP_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RHS_OF_DATA_ITEM_LOOP_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The right hand side (RHS) of the loop condition data item expression "%1s" with identifier "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_RHS_OF_DATA_ITEM_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RHS_OF_DATA_ITEM_TRANSITION_CONDITION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The right hand side (RHS) of the data item condition expression with identifier "%1s" for the transition "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_RHS_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RHS_OF_LOOP_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The right hand side (RHS) of the loop condition function expression "%1s" with identifier "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_RHS_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RHS_OF_TRANSITION_CONDITION_FUNCTION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The right hand side (RHS) of the function condition expression with identifier "%1s" for the transition "%2s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_RULE_EXPRESSION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_LOOP_CONDITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RULE_EXPRESSION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_LOOP_CONDITION. en = The rule expression identifier %1s is not unique in the list of expressions associated with the loop condition with identifier %2s. It is used for the following expressions: %3s.

field.name: ID_RULE_EXPRESSION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_TRANSITION_CONDITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RULE_EXPRESSION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_TRANSITION_CONDITION. en = The rule expression identifier %1s is not unique in the list of expressions associated with the transition with identifier %2s. It is used for the following expressions: %3s.

field.name: ID_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND. en = Unable to retrieve a rule set for the allocation strategy. The rule set may no longer exist.

field.name: ID_SAME_FROM_AND_TO_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SAME_FROM_AND_TO_ACTIVITY. en = A transition cannot have the same from and to activity defined.

field.name: ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_LINK_PARAMETER_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The secondary action link parameter name must be supplied.

field.name: ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_MESSAGE_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_MESSAGE_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The message text for the decision activity secondary action must be specified.

field.name: ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_PAGE_ID_CONTAINS_SPACES
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_PAGE_ID_CONTAINS_SPACES. en = The page id supplied for the decision activity secondary action cannot contain spaces.

field.name: ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_PAGE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SECONDARY_ACTION_PAGE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The decision activity secondary action page id must be specified.

field.name: ID_SPLIT_TYPE_OF_ACTIVITY_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SPLIT_TYPE_OF_ACTIVITY_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The split type of an activity cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_START_PROCESS_HAS_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_START_PROCESS_HAS_MULTIPLE_OUTGOING_TRANSITIONS. en = The start process activity has more than one outgoing transition and cannot therefore have it's split type changed to 'NONE'. A start process activity with a split type of 'NONE' must have just one outgoing transition.

field.name: ID_START_PROCESS_INVALID_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_START_PROCESS_INVALID_INCOMING_TRANSITIONS. en = The start process activity should not specify any incoming transitions.

field.name: ID_START_PROCESS_SPLIT_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_START_PROCESS_SPLIT_TYPE_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A split type must be specified for the start process activity.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_DOES_NOT_REFER_TO_RELEASED_PROCESS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_DOES_NOT_REFER_TO_RELEASED_PROCESS. en = This subflow activity does not refer to a valid workflow process definition with at least one released version.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_INPUT_MAPPING_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_INPUT_MAPPING_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = A parent workflow data object attribute was not supplied. A parent workflow data object attribute must be provided when editing a subflow input mapping.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_MAPPING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPES_MISMATCH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_MAPPING_ATTRIBUTE_TYPES_MISMATCH. en = The types of the target and source workflow data object attributes for the subflow mapping must be compatible.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_MAPPING_LIST_ATTRIBUTE_TYPES_INCOMPATIBLE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_MAPPING_LIST_ATTRIBUTE_TYPES_INCOMPATIBLE. en = The mapping between "%1s" and "%2s" is invalid as an attribute of a list workflow data object cannot be mapped to an attribute of a non-list workflow data object.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A subflow output mapping with the specified workflow data object attributes already exists.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_PARENT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_PARENT_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = A parent workflow data object attribute was not supplied. A parent workflow data object attribute must be provided when editing a subflow output mapping.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_SUBFLOW_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_SUBFLOW_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = A subflow workflow data object attribute was not supplied. A parent workflow data object attribute must be provided when editing a subflow output mapping.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPING_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_SUPPLIED. en = A parent workflow data object attribute was not supplied. A parent workflow data object attribute must be provided when editing a subflow output mapping.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_PARENT_WDO_ALREADY_MAPPED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_PARENT_WDO_ALREADY_MAPPED. en = A subflow output mapping with the specified parent workflow data object attribute already exists.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CANNOT_BE_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CANNOT_BE_FOUND. en = The workflow process associated with this subflow activity can no longer be found. Please select a different workflow process.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CONFLICT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CONFLICT. en = The workflow process "%1s" cannot contain a subflow workflow process that references back to itself.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CORRUPT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_CORRUPT. en = The subflow process referenced by this subflow activity is corrupt. Please change this activity to reference a valid subflow process definition.

field.name: ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_NOT_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_SUBFLOW_PROCESS_NOT_DEFINED_FOR_ACTIVITY. en = A reference to the subflow process has not been defined for the subflow activity.

field.name: ID_TASK_ACTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TASK_ACTION_TEXT_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The message text for the task action must be specified.

field.name: ID_TASK_PRIORITY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_STRING_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TASK_PRIORITY_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_MUST_BE_STRING_TYPE. en = The workflow data object "%1s" with attribute "%2s" is not a valid workflow data object attribute for a manual activity task priority mapping.

field.name: ID_TEXT_PARAMETER_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_PLACEHOLDERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TEXT_PARAMETER_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The text parameter "%1s" cannot be created. The number of workflow data object attributes mapped cannot exceed the number of text placeholders.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_ACTIVITIES_MUST_DIFFER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_ACTIVITIES_MUST_DIFFER. en = The source and target activities selected for a transition definition cannot be the same activity.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = A transition already exists between the activities "%1s" and "%2s" in the workflow process definition.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_FROM_ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_FROM_ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The from activity for the transition with identifier %1s has either not been specified or does not exist.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_PROCESS_DEFINITION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_IDENTIFIER_NOT_UNIQUE_WITHIN_PROCESS_DEFINITION. en = The transition identifier %1s is not unique in the process definition. It is used for the transitions linking the following activities: %2s.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_INCORRECT_SPLIT_TYPE_FOR_REORDER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_INCORRECT_SPLIT_TYPE_FOR_REORDER. en = Transitions can only be reordered on a source activity with a split type of XOR. The split type on activity "%1s" is not set to XOR.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_INVALID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_INVALID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED. en = Activity "%1s" is not a valid activity.

field.name: ID_TRANSITION_TO_ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TRANSITION_TO_ACTIVITY_DOES_NOT_EXIST_OR_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The to activity for the transition with identifier %1s has either not been specified or does not exist.

field.name: ID_TYPE_FOR_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TYPE_FOR_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The type for the allocation strategy cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_TYPE_OF_BIZ_OBJECT_FOR_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_TYPE_OF_BIZ_OBJECT_FOR_BIZ_OBJECT_ASSOCIATION_CANNOT_BE_BLANK. en = The type of the business object association containing the workflow data object mapping "%1s" cannot be blank.

field.name: ID_UNRELEASED_VERSION_OF_PROCESS_ALREADY_EXISTS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_UNRELEASED_VERSION_OF_PROCESS_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = An unreleased version of workflow process %1s already exists. Select the overwrite option to replace the existing version with the imported version.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_MAPPED_TO_SUBJECT_TEXT_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_MAPPED_TO_SUBJECT_TEXT_PARAMETER. en = The workflow data object attribute "%1s" is already mapped as a subject text parameter for this activity.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_MAPPED_TO_TEXT_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ALREADY_MAPPED_TO_TEXT_PARAMETER. en = The selected workflow data object attribute "%1s" is already mapped as a text parameter.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_CANNOT_BE_MAPPED_TO_MESSAGE_TEXT_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_CANNOT_BE_MAPPED_TO_MESSAGE_TEXT_PARAMETER. en = The workflow data object attribute "%1s" cannot be mapped, as the message text has not yet been created.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A category name must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A display name for the workflow data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A workflow data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_PRIMITIVE_MAPPING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_ID_NOT_SPECIFIED_FOR_PRIMITIVE_MAPPING. en = A workflow data object attribute must be specified for mappings to primitive types.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH. en = The length of the name of the specified workflow data object attribute "%1s" is "%2n". The maximum allowed length for a workflow data object attribute name is "%3n".

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_IS_A_RESERVED_WORD
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_IS_A_RESERVED_WORD. en = A workflow data object attribute cannot be created with the name "value". This is a reserved word in the Curam workflow system.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The name of the workflow data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER. en = The name of the workflow data object attribute must be a valid Java identifier.

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_ASSIGNABLE_TO_RDO_ATTRIBUTE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_NOT_ASSIGNABLE_TO_RDO_ATTRIBUTE. en = The workflow data object attribute "%1s" is not assignable to the rules data object attribute "%2s".

field.name: ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_ATTRIBUTE_TYPE_MUST_BE_SPECIFIED. en = The type of the workflow data object attribute must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_DISPLAY_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = A display name for the workflow data object must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_INSUFFICIENT_WDO_MAPPINGS_PROVIDED_FOR_BPO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_INSUFFICIENT_WDO_MAPPINGS_PROVIDED_FOR_BPO. en = The method "%1s" on the interface "%2s" contains "%3s" parameters but mappings have only been provided for "%4s" of these in the process definition. Mappings must be provided for all the parameters of this method.

field.name: ID_WDO_NAME_CONTAINS_A_RESERVED_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_NAME_CONTAINS_A_RESERVED_PREFIX. en = A workflow data object cannot be created with the prefix "Context_". This is a reserved prefix in the Curam workflow system.

field.name: ID_WDO_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_NAME_EXCEEDS_ALLOWED_LENGTH. en = The length of the name of the specified workflow data object "%1s" is "%2n". The maximum allowed length for a workflow data object name is "%3n".

field.name: ID_WDO_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_NAME_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The name of the workflow data object must be specified.

field.name: ID_WDO_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_NAME_NOT_VALID_JAVA_IDENTIFIER. en = The name of the workflow data object must be a valid Java identifier.

field.name: ID_WDO_SPECIFIED_AS_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_ACTION_NOT_A_LIST_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_SPECIFIED_AS_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_ACTION_NOT_A_LIST_WDO. en = The workflow data object "%1s" specified as the multiple occurring action workflow data object for the action with page identifier "%2s" is not a list workflow data object. The workflow data object specified as the multiple occurring action workflow data object must be a list workflow data object.

field.name: ID_WDO_SPECIFIED_AS_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_NOT_A_LIST_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WDO_SPECIFIED_AS_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_NOT_A_LIST_WDO. en = The workflow data object "%1s" specified as the multiple occurring event workflow data object for the event "%2s" is not a list workflow data object. The workflow data object specified as the multiple occurring event workflow data object must be a list workflow data object.

field.name: ID_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_CLASS_DOES_NOT_EXTEND_REQUIRED_CLASS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_CLASS_DOES_NOT_EXTEND_REQUIRED_CLASS. en = The class with the name "%1s" that has been specified as the web service callback service class does not extend the "%2s" class. Web service callback service classes must extend this class.

field.name: ID_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_CLASS_NOT_FOUND_ON_CLASSAPTH
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WEBSERVICE_CALLBACK_SERVICE_CLASS_NOT_FOUND_ON_CLASSAPTH. en = The class name "%1s" that has been specified as the web service callback service class cannot be found on the classpath.

field.name: ID_WORKFLOW_ENGINE_ATTRIBUTE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WORKFLOW_ENGINE_ATTRIBUTE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED. en = The workflow engine attribute can not be removed from the workflow process definition.

field.name: ID_WORKFLOW_ENGINE_WDO_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WORKFLOW_ENGINE_WDO_CANNOT_BE_DELETED. en = The workflow engine workflow data object can not be removed from a workflow process definition.

field.name: ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_CONTAINS_MORE_THAN_ONE_ENGINE_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_CONTAINS_MORE_THAN_ONE_ENGINE_WDO. en = The workflow process: "%1s" contains more than one engine workflow data object.

field.name: ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_ALREADY_RELEASED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_ALREADY_RELEASED. en = The workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" cannot be released as it has already been released.

field.name: ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_STRUCTURAL_ERROR
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_STRUCTURAL_ERROR. en = There is a problem with the workflow structure: %1s

field.name: INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_IS_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_IS_VALID. en = The specified activity is valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_MISSING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_MISSING. en = Not all mandatory notification information has been supplied for this activity.

field.name: INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_NOTIFICATION_IS_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_NOTIFICATION_IS_VALID. en = The specified activity notification is valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED_BY_BEGIN_LOOP_REFERENCE_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED_BY_BEGIN_LOOP_REFERENCE_INVALID. en = The activity specified in the Loop Begin reference of this Loop End activity is invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED_BY_END_LOOP_REFERENCE_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ACTIVITY_SPECIFIED_BY_END_LOOP_REFERENCE_INVALID. en = The activity specified in the Loop End reference of this Loop Begin activity is invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ALLOCATION_STRATEGY_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The business process object method definition associated with this deadline handler does not contain any input parameters.

field.name: INFO_ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_AUTOMATIC_ACTIVITY_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The business process object method definition associated with this automatic activity does not contain any input parameters.

field.name: INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The specified business process object method definition does not contain any input parameters and therefore no input parameter mappings can be created for it.

field.name: INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS_EXISTING_MAPPINGS_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS_EXISTING_MAPPINGS_INVALID. en = The specified business process object method does not contain any input formal parameters. The existing input parameter mappings that have been specified are now invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The business process object method associated with this automatic activity does not contain an output parameter and therefore no output mappings can be created for it.

field.name: INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETER_EXISTING_MAPPINGS_INVALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_BPO_METHOD_NO_OUTPUT_PARAMETER_EXISTING_MAPPINGS_INVALID. en = The business process object method associated with this automatic activity does not contain an output parameter. The existing output parameter mappings that have been specified are now invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_INPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The list of input mappings cannot be displayed as the business process object method associated with the automatic activity "%1s" has not been specified.

field.name: INFO_ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_CANNOT_DISPLAY_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_BPO_NOT_SPECIFIED. en = The list of output mappings cannot be displayed as the business process object method associated with the automatic activity "%1s" has not been specified.

field.name: INFO_ID_CONDITION_CANNOT_REFERENCE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_CONTEXT_WDOS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_CONDITION_CANNOT_REFERENCE_MUTUALLY_EXCLUSIVE_CONTEXT_WDOS. en = Transition conditions on the same transition cannot reference both "%1s" and "%2s". These are mutually-exclusive Objects, they cannot exist simultaneously at runtime.

field.name: INFO_ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_DEADLINE_HANDLER_BPO_METHOD_NO_INPUT_PARAMETERS. en = The business process object method definition associated with this deadline handler does not contain any input parameters.

field.name: INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_ARE_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_ARE_VALID. en = The enactment mappings for the workflow process are valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NOT_CORRESPOND_WITH_REQUIRED_WDO_ATTRIBUTES
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NOT_CORRESPOND_WITH_REQUIRED_WDO_ATTRIBUTES. en = The list of enactment mappings does not correspond to the list of workflow data object attributes that have been marked as required for enactment.

field.name: INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NOT_DEFINED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_NOT_DEFINED. en = There are no enactment mappings defined for the workflow process definition "%1s" version "%2s". The create enactment mappings link may be used to create enactment mappings.

field.name: INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION. en = The end process activity

field.name: INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_NAME. en = End Process Activity

field.name: INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_END_PROCESS_PREFIX. en = the end activity ('%1s')

field.name: INFO_ID_INVALID_EVENT_DETAILS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_INVALID_EVENT_DETAILS. en = The Event specified is not valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_INVALID_MAPPINGS_SPECIFIED_FOR_RETURN_PARAMETER
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_INVALID_MAPPINGS_SPECIFIED_FOR_RETURN_PARAMETER. en = At least one of the mappings specified for the return parameter of the business process object method associated with this automatic activity is invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_TEXT_PLACEHOLDERS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_INVALID_NUMBER_OF_TEXT_PLACEHOLDERS. en = The number of placeholders used in the text does not equal the number of mapped workflow data object attributes.

field.name: INFO_ID_JOIN_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_JOIN_PREFIX. en = the %1s join at activity '%2s'

field.name: INFO_ID_LOOP_BEGIN_ACTIVITY_NAME_SUFFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_LOOP_BEGIN_ACTIVITY_NAME_SUFFIX. en = [Begin]

field.name: INFO_ID_LOOP_BEGIN_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_LOOP_BEGIN_PREFIX. en = the Loop Begin activity '%1s'

field.name: INFO_ID_LOOP_END_ACTIVITY_NAME_SUFFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_LOOP_END_ACTIVITY_NAME_SUFFIX. en = [End]

field.name: INFO_ID_LOOP_END_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_LOOP_END_PREFIX. en = the Loop End activity '%1s'

field.name: INFO_ID_MAPPED_PARAMETERS_SPECIFIED_NOT_MATCHING_BPO_METHOD
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_MAPPED_PARAMETERS_SPECIFIED_NOT_MATCHING_BPO_METHOD. en = At least one of the mappings specified for the input formal parameters of the business process object method is invalid.

field.name: INFO_ID_METHOD_WITH_METADATA_PARAMETERS_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_METHOD_WITH_METADATA_PARAMETERS_NOT_FOUND. en = The method "%1s" with signature "%2s" cannot be found. The method parameter mappings must be refreshed.

field.name: INFO_ID_MINIMUM_QUESTION_DATA_NOT_SUPPLIED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_MINIMUM_QUESTION_DATA_NOT_SUPPLIED. en = The minimum amount of question data for this Decision Activity has not yet been supplied.

field.name: INFO_ID_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_NOT_LIST_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_MATCH_DATA_NOT_LIST_WDO. en = As a multiple occurring event is being created, the workflow data object selected must be a list workflow data object.

field.name: INFO_ID_NOT_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_OR_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NOT_MULTIPLE_OCCURRING_EVENT_OR_ACTIVITY_NOT_IN_LOOP. en = As a multiple occurring event is not being created or the activity with this mapping is not contained within a loop, the workflow data object selected cannot be a list workflow data object.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_ANSWER_DEFINED_FOR_MULTIPLE_CHOICE_QUESTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_ANSWER_DEFINED_FOR_MULTIPLE_CHOICE_QUESTION. en = No answers have been defined for this multiple choice question.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_BUSINESS_PROCESS_OBJECT_METHODS_FOR_CATEGORY_AND_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_BUSINESS_PROCESS_OBJECT_METHODS_FOR_CATEGORY_AND_TYPE. en = There are no business process object methods of this type associated with this category.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_DEFINED_ON_WORKFLOW
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_ENACTMENT_MAPPINGS_DEFINED_ON_WORKFLOW. en = The workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" does not contain enactment mappings. This means any struct data passed into the enactment service API (when enacting this workflow process from code) will not be mapped into any Workflow Data Objects.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_RELEASED_WORKFLOWS_IN_SPECIFIED_CATEGORY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_RELEASED_WORKFLOWS_IN_SPECIFIED_CATEGORY. en = There are no released workflow process definitions in the specified category.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_ASSIGNABLE_TO_REQUIRED_TYPE
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_ASSIGNABLE_TO_REQUIRED_TYPE. en = There are no workflow data object attributes available that are assignable to a type of "%1s".

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_IN_SELECTED_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_IN_SELECTED_WDO. en = The workflow data object "%1s" does not contain any attributes.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_WDO_TEMPLATES_IN_SPECIFIED_CATEGORY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_WDO_TEMPLATES_IN_SPECIFIED_CATEGORY. en = There are no workflow data object templates present in the specified category.

field.name: INFO_ID_NO_WORKFLOW_DATA_OBJECTS_DEFINED_FOR_OPERATION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_NO_WORKFLOW_DATA_OBJECTS_DEFINED_FOR_OPERATION. en = There are no workflow data objects defined that can be used for this operation.

field.name: INFO_ID_PROCESS_VERSION_NOT_LATEST_RELEASED_VERSION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_PROCESS_VERSION_NOT_LATEST_RELEASED_VERSION. en = The version of this process definition that you want to edit is not the latest released version. Therefore any changes made to more recent versions of this process will be lost when the new version is created.

field.name: INFO_ID_QUESTION_DATA_NOT_SUPPLIED_FOR_CONTEXT_DECISION_ATTRIBUTES
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_QUESTION_DATA_NOT_SUPPLIED_FOR_CONTEXT_DECISION_ATTRIBUTES. en = The question details associated with this decision activity have not been completed. Therefore, there are no attributes yet available for this workflow data object.

field.name: INFO_ID_REMINDER_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_MISSING
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_REMINDER_NOTIFICATION_INFORMATION_MISSING. en = Not all mandatory notification information has been supplied for this reminder.

field.name: INFO_ID_RESULT_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_CANNOT_BE_DISPLAYED
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_RESULT_WDO_ATTRIBUTES_CANNOT_BE_DISPLAYED. en = The attributes of the result workflow data object cannot be displayed for the automatic activity "%1s" as the business process object method does not exist for this activity.

field.name: INFO_ID_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_RULE_SET_NOT_FOUND. en = Unable to retrieve a rule set for the allocation strategy. The rule set may no longer exist.

field.name: INFO_ID_SPLIT_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_SPLIT_PREFIX. en = the %1s split at activity '%2s'

field.name: INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION. en = The start process activity

field.name: INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_NAME
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_ACTIVITY_NAME. en = Start Process Activity

field.name: INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_PREFIX
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_START_PROCESS_PREFIX. en = the start activity ('%1s')

field.name: INFO_ID_SUBFLOW_INPUT_MAPPING_NO_LONGER_EXISTS_FOR_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_SUBFLOW_INPUT_MAPPING_NO_LONGER_EXISTS_FOR_ACTIVITY. en = The list of mapped workflow data object attributes does not correspond to those marked as required for enactment in the subflow process definition.

field.name: INFO_ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_FOR_ASYNCHRONOUS_SUBFLOW_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_SUBFLOW_OUTPUT_MAPPINGS_FOR_ASYNCHRONOUS_SUBFLOW_ACTIVITY. en = The output mappings defined for this subflow activity are not valid for an asynchronous subflow activity.

field.name: INFO_ID_TRANSITIONS_ARE_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_TRANSITIONS_ARE_VALID. en = The transitions in the workflow process are valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_TRANSITION_ORDER_WARNING_WITH_XOR_SPLIT
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_TRANSITION_ORDER_WARNING_WITH_XOR_SPLIT. en = The source activity "%1s" has a split type of XOR. Care should therefore be taken in placing a new transition as the order of the transitions in an XOR split type is important.

field.name: INFO_ID_UNNAMED_WORKFLOW_ACTIVITY
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_UNNAMED_WORKFLOW_ACTIVITY. en = Unnamed Activity

field.name: INFO_ID_WDOS_ARE_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WDOS_ARE_VALID. en = The workflow data objects in the workflow process are valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_WDO_IS_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WDO_IS_VALID. en = The specified workflow data object is valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_CONTAINS_ONE_ENGINE_WDO
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_CONTAINS_ONE_ENGINE_WDO. en = The process definition contains only the workflow engine workflow data object.

field.name: INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_STRUCTURE_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_STRUCTURE_VALID. en = The structure of the specified workflow process definition is valid. Other problems may still exist, to see these perform full process validation.

field.name: INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_STRUCTURE_VALID_WITH_WARNINGS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_STRUCTURE_VALID_WITH_WARNINGS. en = The structure of the specified workflow process definition is valid, but does contain the warnings outlined below. Other problems may still exist, to see these perform full process validation.

field.name: INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_VALID
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_VALID. en = The specified workflow process definition is valid.

field.name: INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_VALID_WITH_WARNINGS
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_ID_WORKFLOW_PROCESS_DEFINITION_VALID_WITH_WARNINGS. en = The specified workflow process definition is valid, but does contain the warnings outlined below.

field.name: INFO_PROCESS_DEFINITION_CREATED_BY_USER_UNKNOWN
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:INFO_PROCESS_DEFINITION_CREATED_BY_USER_UNKNOWN. en = Unknown

field.name: RUN_ID_CANNOT_INVOKE_VALIDATION_FUNCTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:RUN_ID_CANNOT_INVOKE_VALIDATION_FUNCTION. en = The get method associated with the component type "%1s" could not be invoked.

field.name: RUN_ID_CANNOT_RETRIEVE_VALIDATION_FUNCTION
field.doc: ProcessDefinitionTool:RUN_ID_CANNOT_RETRIEVE_VALIDATION_FUNCTION. en = The get method associated with the component type "%1s" could not be retrieved.

class.doc: Generated ProcessDefinitionTool message file.

class.name: PROPERTY

field.name: ID_LAST_DESCRIPTION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
field.doc: Property:ID_LAST_DESCRIPTION_CANNOT_BE_DELETED. en = The last property description cannot be deleted. The property must be deleted instead.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_CATEGORY_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY. en = A Property category must be provided.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_DESCRIPTION_EXISTS
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_DESCRIPTION_EXISTS. en = A property description for the property "%1s" and for the language code "%2s" entered is already defined.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_DESC_DISPLAYNAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_DESC_DISPLAYNAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY. en = A Property Description display name must be provided.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_DESC_LOCALE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_DESC_LOCALE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY. en = A Property Description locale must be provided.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_DESC_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_DESC_NOT_FOUND. en = The property description for the language code entered could not be found.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_NAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_NAME_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY. en = A Property name must be provided.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_NOT_FOUND
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_NOT_FOUND. en = A matching Properties entry cannot be found.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_TYPE_CANNOT_BE_EMPTY. en = A Property type must be provided.

field.name: ID_PROPERTY_WITH_NAME_EXISTS
field.doc: Property:ID_PROPERTY_WITH_NAME_EXISTS. en = A property with the name "%1s" is already defined.

field.name: ID_SCHEMA_FILE_NOT_FOUND

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_ABORT_PROCESS_INSTANCE. en = The selected process instance is complete and therefore cannot be aborted.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_ADD_EVENT_CLASS_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The event class entry %1s cannot be added because an entry already exists for this event class.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_ADD_EVENT_TYPE_ENTRY_ALREADY_EXISTS. en = The event type entry %1s cannot be added because an entry already exists for this event type.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_ADD_EVENT_TYPE_EVENT_CLASS_DOES_NOT_EXIST. en = The event type entry: %1s cannot be added because the corresponding event class: %1s does not exist.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_ENACTED_PROCESS_DEFINITION. en = The workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" was previously enacted and hence cannot be deleted.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_PROCESS_NO_RELEASED_VERSION_FOR_EVENT_ENACTMENT. en = The process definition "%1s" cannot be deleted, as it enacted from at least one event and no other released version of this process is available.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_PROCESS_REFERENCED_BY_RELEASED_SUBFLOW
field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_PROCESS_REFERENCED_BY_RELEASED_SUBFLOW. en = The workflow process definition "%1s", version "%2s" cannot be deleted as it is referenced by the subflow activity "%3s" in the released process definition "%4s", version "%5s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_DELETE_PROCESS_RELEASED_VERSION_INVALID_FOR_EVENT
field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_DELETE_PROCESS_RELEASED_VERSION_INVALID_FOR_EVENT. en = The process definition "%1s" cannot be deleted, as it enacted from at least one event and the previous released version does not have enough enactment data to be enacted from the events mapped.

field.name: ID_CANNOT_FIND_EVENT_FOR_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE
field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_FIND_EVENT_FOR_ACTIVITY_INSTANCE. en = The activity instance "%1s" supplied is not applicable for the event class "%2s", type "%3s" with event match data %4s".

field.name: ID_CANNOT_MARSHAL_XML
field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_MARSHAL_XML. en = An error occurred converting the process definition to XML.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_OVERRIDE_EVENT_ACTIVITY_TYPE_NOT_MANUAL_OR_EVENT_WAIT. en = The event cannot be overridden as the associated activity type is not manual or event wait.

field.doc: Workflow:ID_CANNOT_OVERRIDE_EVENT_NO_RAISED_BY_USERNAME_SUPPLIED. en = The event cannot be overridden as a raised by user name mapping has been specified for the event wait associated with this activity instance "%1n" and must therefore be supplied.

getParams

Gets the parameters of the current item.
@return Map containing the parameter info for the current item.

method.doc:
Adds the parameters from the specified item to the current item.

method.name: addChild
method.doc:
Adds another item as a child item to the current one.
@param childItem the tree item to be added as a child of the current item.

method.name: setLazyLoad
method.doc:
Marks the current item as being lazy loaded, which means that its children information is obtained later, by a separate request.
@param loaderClass the name of the loader class used to construct the children information for the current item.

method.name: setSelected
method.doc: Marks the specified item in the tree as selected. Once loaded, this item should be highlighted in the tree and the appropriate page loaded. The selectedNode should specify the full path to the selected node in the tree in the format '/ancestorId1/../ancestorId#n/parentId/selectedNodeId'. If the method is used with null or blank string argument, the current item will be set as selected, the equivalent of using setSelected. Note that if selected information is set subsequently by any child items or siblings being added, the last occurrence will be used as the finally selected. @param selectedNode the path to the selected node.

method.name: setSelected
method.doc:
Marks the current item in the tree as being selected. Once loaded, this item should be highlighted in the tree and the appropriate page loaded.
Note that if selected information is set subsequently by any child items or siblings being added, the last occurrence will be used as the finally selected.

method.name: getOutput
method.doc:
Produces and returns the tree item information in the format required by the specific implementation.
@return Object implementation-dependent object representing the lazy loaded tree item fully rendered and ready to return to the client tier.

interface.doc: The interface describes the public API, methods available when constructing the custom lazy loading tree loader. The API is described in terms of a single item in the tree which could be added to the desired place of the tree fragment being constructed by the descendant of the OrgTreeLoader class. @see curam.util.orgtree.impl.OrgTreeLoader @author SKovanas

class.name: OrgTreeLoader

method.name: load
method.doc:
Constructs the tree fragment by invoking the custom method, implemented by the derived classes. This method should only be called directly during testing.
@throws AppException if the tree fragment construction fails at some stage.

method.name: createRootItem
construct
method.doc: This method must be implemented by all lazy tree loader implementations. It is responsible for constructing the tree fragment starting with the root item of the current fragment. The loaders are invoked for both the initial loads of the tree fragments and when updating them after the potential node addition/deletion/editing. A care should be taken to cater for the situation, where the requested root item is not available any longer (has been just deleted). In this case the construct method should just explicitly return to allow the tree widget be sent the right information. @throws AppException If the tree fragment construction fails.

class.doc: This is the superclass of any class which outputs the requested fragment for the lazy loading tree. Any descendants should just implement constructFragment method to output the tree fragment which is then returned and inserted into the tree widget rendered on the client side. The fragment is always started by creating the root item specifically with the createRootItem method; the rest of the items are constructed and added to their parent items the usual way. The rendered fragment is returned by the getResult method. This, however, is done under the hood and the constructFragment method of the custom loader should not be invoking it, rather just concentrating on creating the required items, setting their appropriate parameters and setting the correct parent - child relationships between them. The loader developer can choose to add all the child items immediately after their parent-to-be is constructed, or set the parent to be "lazy-loaded", which means that the children of that item will be obtained on demand via a separate request and from a different loader, taking this parent item as the root item (constructed again via createRootItem of that separate loader). The item is marked to be lazy loaded with the setLazyLoad method of the OrgTreeItem; the method is supplied with the fully qualified class name of the loader to be used. The current implementation of this class uses the default tree item implementation, OrgTreeJsonItem, which could not be overridden at this stage. @see curam.util.orgtree.impl.OrgTreeItem @see curam.util.orgtree.impl.OrgTreeJsonItem @author SKovanas

class.doc:
Gets application runtime properties. This class encapsulates the application's dependence on runtime property files, command line parameters, system settings, and so on.

Properties are name/value pairs in the format defined by java.util.Properties. The order in which settings are determined is:

  • a) by looking up System properties. (These in turn can be overridden on the command line by using the java -D option.
  • b) by looking up the properties listed on the database.
  • c) by looking up the specified the default property file Bootstrap.properties.

    If a property is not found a debug message is written as a trace record. @author PS

class.name: CTIData

method.name: parseParameters

class.doc:
Utility class for handling CTI Data. CTI Data is an encoded list of name and value pairs. The data is encoded to protect the actual URL from any characters in the data that will conflict with the URL. It is encoded using the org.apache.commons.codec.net.URLCodec.encode() method and the UTF-8 character set encoding.
@author SC

class.name: DBtoJMS

method.name: beginTransfer
method.doc:
Initiates the transfer of messages from their temporary holding table on the database to their target JMS queues. This method has two normal modes of operation:
  • Inside of application server. In this mode, a deferred process is started which triggers the transfer of messages.
  • Outside of application server. In this mode (i.e. in a batch process) the application will send a HTTP request to the application server to trigger the transfer of messages. This means that the application server must be running and, and its host address must be known.

    • A third operating mode can be specified by setting boolean property {@link curam.util.resources.EnvironmentConstants.BatchLauncher#kDBtoJMSnotificationStubbed curam.batchlauncher.dbtojms.notification.test.stubtrigger}. This mode is provided to facilitate debugging batch jobs which use DBtoJMS without requiring an application server to be running. Such batch jobs cause JMS messages to be stored on the database, but the messages cannot be transferred because the transfer requires an application server to be running. Therefore setting this property stubs out this method and causes it to do nothing. The pending messages can be transferred by simply starting JMSLiteEngine. @return The instance data ID of the deferred process which resulted from this call, or zero if the trigger has been stubbed out. @throws AppException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#ID_DBTOJMS_MUST_SPECIFY_NOTIFICATION_HOST_AND_PORT ID_DBTOJMS_MUST_SPECIFY_NOTIFICATION_HOST_AND_PORT} - if the properties which specify the server host name and port were not correctly specified. @throws InformationalException Generic Exception Signature. @throws AppRuntimeException if the methods to start a deferred process or handle deferred process invocation errors cannot be found on the associated object. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_DBTOJMS_ERROR_NOTIFYING_SERVER RUN_ID_DBTOJMS_ERROR_NOTIFYING_SERVER} - if an error occurred notifying the server. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_INIT_FAILED} - if a connection or session could not be created. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_NO_CONNECTION} - if there is no connection to the named queue. @throws AppRuntimeException {@link INFRASTRUCTURE#RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED RUN_ID_ERR_JMS_MESSAGE_SEND_FAILED} - if the JMS service reported any errors while trying to send the message. @see curam.util.jms.jmslite.JMSLiteEngine

class.doc:
Provides an API to initiate the database-to-JMS message transfer process.
@author BD
