field.name: deadlineDate
field.doc:
The deadline date associated with the task. For the tasks due in the next week search, this is the date that the tasks are due on for each day specified in the search criteria. For the tasks due in the next month search, this deadline date represents the Monday of each week for which tasks that are due are required.

DEADLINE_DATE -> curam.util.type.Date

field.name: taskReservedCount
field.doc:
The number of tasks that have been reserved and are due on the specified date.

WORKFLOW_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS -> int

field.name: taskUnreservedCount
field.doc:
The number of tasks that have are unreserved and are due on the specified date.

WORKFLOW_NUMBER_OF_RECORDS -> int

class.doc: A structure containing a task deadline date and a count of all of the reserved and unreserved tasks associated with a specified case that are due on that date.

class.name: XMLPrintStream

constructor.name: XMLPrintStream
constructor.doc:
Construct an XML Print Stream instance using the host name and port provided. The host and port provided as parameters here will always be overridden by the host and port specified in the open method or alternatively by the host and port configured in the application configuration file.
@param host The name of the host of which the XML Server resides @param port The port on which the XML Server is listening

constructor.name: XMLPrintStream
constructor.doc:
Construct an XML Print Stream instance using a list of endpoints. The host and port provided as parameters here will always be overridden by the host and port specified in the open method or alternatively by the host and port configured in the application configuration file.
@param endpoints The endpoints for the XML servers

constructor.name: XMLPrintStream
constructor.doc: Construct an XML Print Stream instance.

method.name: setPrinterName
method.doc:
Set the name of the printer to be used.
@param name The specified printer name

method.name: setPaperTray
method.doc:
Set the kind of paper tray to be used.
@param tray The specified paper tray

method.name: setUserName
method.doc:
Set the user name related to the print job.
@param user The specified user name

method.name: setEmailAddress
method.doc:
Set the email address.
@param email The specified email address

method.name: setJobType
method.doc:
Set the job type.
@param job The specified job type

method.name: setEncoding
getEncoding
setPreviewStream
method.doc:
Setting the preview stream will cause the PDF data to be written to the specified stream rather than be sent to the printer (or whatever the XML server has been configured to do with it).

Use an OutputStream to capture the PDF in a string if it is to be returned to the client application. The stream should be opened before passing it in and will not be closed by the PrintStream. @param preview The specified output stream

method.name: open
open
open
open
open
open
getStream
method.doc:
Obtain the steam that is used for XML Server communication.
@return The stream that should be used for communication

method.name: close
method.doc:
Closes the connection to the print engine and allows printing to commence.
@throws AppException {@link curam.util.message.CURAMXML#ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE ERR_PRINT_STREAM_BAD_RESPONSE} - An unexpected response was received when communicating with the XMLServer. @throws AppException {@link curam.util.message.CURAMXML#ERR_PRINT_STREAM_NO_RESPONSE ERR_PRINT_STREAM_NO_RESPONSE} - Could not communicate with the XMLServer to close the dialog.

class.doc:
This class is responsible for communication with the XML Print Server.
@author DM

class.doc:
Utility functions useful when selecting templates for printing documents.
@author RM

interface.name: XSLTemplateUtility

method.name: getLatestTemplate
method.doc: Returns the details of the latest version of a given template. [Server Only]

method.name: getTemplate
method.doc: Returns the details of a given template instance. [Server Only]

method.name: getLatestTemplateKey
method.doc: Returns the key of the latest version of a given template. This is useful when supplying a specific template instance key to a PrintStream. [Server Only]

method.name: getLatestTemplateByName
method.doc: Gets the latest instance of a template given its name.

method.name: getAllTemplates
method.doc: Gets all the available XSL templates.

method.name: getAllTemplatesByType
method.doc: Gets all the XSL templates whose templateType code matches the specified code.

method.name: getLatestTemplateByIDCode
method.doc: Gets the latest instance of a template given the ID code and locale.

method.name: getNewTemplateID
method.doc: Gets a new template ID number.

method.name: getNewDocumentID
method.doc: Gets a new document ID number.

method.name: getLatestTemplateKeyByIDCode
method.doc: Gets the key to the latest instance of a template given the ID code and locale.

interface.doc: Utility functions useful when selecting templates for printing documents. (This is assigned to the dummy server to force the SDE to build the BOL library.)
